channel.title: Alert error
channel.description:
hey i was trying to get an alert.java and stuff but i got these 5 errors client sided [code]
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Sparta-Scape Official Client>"C:/Program Files/Ja va/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/javac.exe" *.java sign/*.java AlertHandler.java:34: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ AlertHandler.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ AlertHandler.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: class Sprite c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX (), alert.getY(), hovered ? alert.getOpacity()+25 : alert.getOpacity()); ^ AlertHandler.java:56: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(0, alert.getTit le(), alert.getY()+16, alert.getX()+243); ^ AlertHandler.java:57: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(alert.getTitleC olor(), alert.getTitle(), alert.getY()+15, alert.getX()+242); ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Sparta-Scape Official Client>pause Press any key to continue . . . [/code/[/code]

item.title: Alert error
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

hey i was trying to get an alert.java and stuff but i got these 5 errors client sided

[code]

C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Sparta-Scape Official Client>“C:/Program Files/Ja
va/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/javac.exe” .java sign/.java
AlertHandler.java:34: cannot find symbol
symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int)
location: class Sprite
c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler
t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity());
^
AlertHandler.java:44: cannot find symbol
symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int)
location: class Sprite
c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler
t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity());
^
AlertHandler.java:49: cannot find symbol
symbol : method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int)
location: class Sprite
c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX
(), alert.getY(), hovered ? alert.getOpacity()+25 : alert.getOpacity());
^
AlertHandler.java:56: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client
c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(0, alert.getTit
le(), alert.getY()+16, alert.getX()+243);
^
AlertHandler.java:57: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client
c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(alert.getTitleC
olor(), alert.getTitle(), alert.getY()+15, alert.getX()+242);
^
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.

5 errors
